title: Adobe Acrobat Guide: Logging into Adobe Acrobat Enterprise/Pro (PDF Maker) with Okta SSO
content: This is a step-by-step guide for logging into Adobe Acrobat Pro (also known as PDF Maker) using Okta and Single Sign-On (SSO). After completing these steps, you should be successfully signed in to your Adobe dashboard, granting you access to Adobe Acrobat Enterprise/Pro. There is an Okta icon in your Chrome toolbar for quick and easy access to ALL your apps? If you don't see it, click the puzzle piece then click the pin next to Okta Browser plugin. From here you can quickly log in to your account and quick access to ALL your apps!

ancestors.title: Adobe Enterprise Products: Guides for logging into Adobe applications
